original_text: They only asked us to do this: We should remember to help the poor people among their group. That is something that I myself wanted very much to do.
korean_text: 다만 우리에게 가난한 자들을 기억하도록 부탁하였으니 이것은 나도 본래부터 힘써 행하여 왔노라

sentences.original_text: They only asked us to do this:
We should remember to help the poor people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 가난한 사람들을 도와야 한다는 것을 기억해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that I myself wanted very much to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 정말 매우 하고 싶었던 것
